name: Star Commander (SydiousMax)
description:
You play as Captain Forest, a Star Captain, who use to be a General but was demoted due to an incident near Saturn. He now needs to prove himself as a Star Captain and protect Earth's boundaries. It's a top-down space shooter focusing on fast-paced, action-packed visuals and light story elements. 

Space Bar: Shoot
Shift: Booster
E: Large Laser
R: Bomb
C: Quick Item PickUp
W,A,S,D: Move
